title: PERIPHERAL VESTIBULAR PAROXYSM IN A DOG: IS IT A NEW ENTITY? Theophanes Liatis 1, Sophia Balla 2, Rania Baka 3, Michael Patsikas 2, Zoe Polizopoulou 3. 1Dick White Referrals, Six Mile Bottom, Cambridgeshire, United Kingdom, 2Companion Animal Clinic, School of Veterinary Medicine, Faculty of Health Sciences, Aristotle University of Thessaloniki, Thessaloniki, Central Macedonia, Greece, 3Diagnostic Laboratory, School of Veterinary Medicine, Faculty of Health Sciences, Aristotle University of Thessaloniki, Thessaloniki, Central Macedonia, Greece.
